name: Meeting of the Selves
description:
The Hero Club is about to be under new management, and Reid's got some misgivings! Join the HTML gang as they team up to solve Reid's problems using their RPG skills to manage aggro and evade attacks!

The next evolution of the Re:Punch battle system introduces even more mind-boggling puzzle encounters and brand new boss music by Sawyer Friend!

Ver 1.1.1
